name: Survive: A Top-down Zombie Defense Game
name_original: Survive: A Top-down Zombie Defense Game
description:
Survive is a top-down, wave-based zombie survival game set on a small, procedural island. The player can earn points to buy weapons and fortifications.

Controls

WASD - move

Q/E - switch to next/previous weapon

Z/X - place turret/barricade

1-5 - select weapon

SPACE - place mine

B - store

SHIFT - sprint

ESC - pause

Mouse - aim/shoot
